body:
Comment 6 by **plamponi**: 
I get the same behavior if the shell is bash 4.0, but everything works fine with bash
3.2 on a different machine.
I've had the same problem with other installation scripts, for example for ati
graphics drivers and for wolfram workbench.
I'm looking into the compat32 option of bash 4.0, to see if it provides the right
workaround, but no luck so far.
